name: Executor (itch) (SoupMaster)
description:
The war has begun ! The Infected are invading the galaxy to spread the Infection and increase its army. You are an Executor, a biorobotic soldier made to eliminate the Infected and win the war.

Experience the EXECUTOR pseudo-AI system in 10 different, huge and challenging missions across the galaxy. 

*Made with the free version of Construct 3 so unfortunately no WASD*
